forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a low around 53. South southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks gently over Downtown San Francisco, an air of muted tranquility envelops the city. With temperatures lingering in the low fiftys, the morning is draped in a shroud of clouds, reminiscent of a soft, gray blanket layered across the sky. The breeze carries whispers from the south-southwest, a mild companion as it dances through the streets, hinting at the coastal presence just beyond the city’s edge. The forecast for today paints a picture of mostly cloudy skies, with the promise of high temperatures reaching near sixty, gradually mellowing as the afternoon unfolds.

In the heart of the city, the fog, a familiar and elusive visitor, can be sensed more than seen. It weaves in and out of the air, blurring the sharper outlines of city life, while the gentle marine layer clings to the hills, softening the world yet again. Dressing comfortably in layers would be wise; a light jacket will serve well amidst the cool breeze and the ever-present coastal chill. 

A day like today invites leisurely pursuits—perhaps a stroll along the waterfront, where each step is accompanied by the salty scent of the ocean. A casual stop at a quaint café for a warm cup of coffee could also provide a cozy respite from the brisk air. As the city stirs to life, the clouds will shape the mood, offering both a sense of calm and an invitation to explore the little joys scattered throughout the day, as fog drifts softly around the iconic landmarks.
